name: The Evil Box
description:
---THIS STILL IN WORK IN PROGRESS SO THERE MIGHT COME UPDATES---

This is a free to play, indie game i made for fun. 
You tab your spacebar to kill it! Tho it regens it health just a little big over time, but you can get stronger too and win!

But hear this warning! 
You might destroy your spacebar, and you should turn off sticky keys

((This game comes with a saving method where you keep your score, damage and autoclicks))
